service_details.title: Our Kubernetes Consulting Services
service_details.subtitle: As a trusted KCSP, our experts provide end-to-end Kubernetes solutions:

sections.title: Kubernetes Advisory
sections.description: Plan and adopt Kubernetes with minimal friction, leveraging our expertise across AWS, GCP, and Azure.
offerings: Audit existing infrastructure and benchmark against industry standards.
Create a tailored roadmap for successful Kubernetes adoption.
Deliver actionable implementation plans aligned with your business objectives.

sections.title: Application Development & Migration
sections.description: Build new applications or migrate monoliths to Kubernetes-ready microservices for scalability and flexibility.
offerings: Break monoliths into loosely coupled microservices.
Centralized management for multi-cluster Kubernetes environments.

sections.title: Kubernetes Deployment Partner
sections.description: Deploy production-grade Kubernetes clusters on cloud or on-premises with high availability and reliability.
offerings: Provision resilient clusters with auto-healing and scalability.
Integrate essential tools like Prometheus and RBAC policies.
Support deployment of ML workloads on Kubernetes.

sections.title: DevSecOps & Compliance
sections.description: Secure Kubernetes workloads with shift-left security and compliance best practices.
offerings: Role-based access, network segmentation, and automatic upgrades.
Continuous container scanning with open source and third-party tools.
Sign, scan, and deploy packages safely across clusters.

sections.title: Enterprise Support & Training
sections.description: Ongoing Kubernetes support and training for teams on public, private, or on-prem environments.
offerings: Observability and vulnerability scanning to prevent downtime.
Train engineers for self-sufficient cloud-native operations.
Implement backup, DR strategies, and cost management.
Ensure timely updates, patches, and rapid releases.
